page.title: 16HOBBIES AND PASTIMES(2)
page.content: {MARCUS:}On Wednesday nights I go dog training at a farm near Etwall.I used to go in the top class with my dog Radish,but she got knocked down by a car and killed.Now I have a new dog called Kym.I only got her on Tuesday, so I have only taken her once.During the hour we do things like heelwork, sit-stays,recalls and down-stays. {JAMES:}On Saturdays my spare time is taken up by Ten-pin bowling.In the League you play 3 games.You have to find the right sized ball so that it does not rub your skin, and it helps you to bowl better.The idea is to bowl the ball down an oiled alley without going over the foul line,and to knock as many pins down as possible.
